buildCommand: ROOT=$(pwd) && if [ ! -d "flutter" ]; then git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1; fi && export PATH="$PATH:$ROOT/flutter/bin" && cd frontend && $ROOT/flutter/bin/flutter build web --release
installCommand: ROOT=$(pwd) && if [ ! -d "flutter" ]; then git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1; fi && export PATH="$PATH:$ROOT/flutter/bin" && cd frontend && $ROOT/flutter/bin/flutter pub get
